comics.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
comics.description: Spidey is pulled to a dimension where he never became Spider-Man.

comics.title: The Mighty Thor
comics.description: The God of Thunder clashes with Galactus!

comics.title: Black Panther
comics.description: T'Challa faces a deadly foe who seeks to overthrow the kingdom of Wakanda.

comics.title: Captain America
comics.description: Cap goes on a mission to stop a dangerous new threat to America.

comics.title: Iron Man
comics.description: Tony Stark faces his deadliest enemy yet, the Mandarin!

comics.title: Doctor Strange
comics.description: The Sorcerer Supreme must stop a powerful new mystical threat!

comics.title: The Avengers
comics.description: The Earth's Mightiest Heroes assemble for a new adventure!

comics.title: The Incredible Hulk
comics.description: Hulk must face his greatest enemy yet, The Leader!

comics.title: Wolverine
comics.description: Logan goes on a journey to find his past, encountering old allies and new enemies!

comics.title: Daredevil
comics.description: Matt Murdock returns to New York City to take on a dangerous new crime syndicate.
